description: The collection of eight stamps features animated designs along with words "will carry us through".
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man stamps recognise key workers' response
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man stamps recognise key workers' response - BBC News
maintext: Ms Cannon said: "We wanted to send a positive message into every home in the Isle of Man and to our friends overseas to say how much we appreciate the people who are working tirelessly for us all."
